Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hepatitis B Virus Core Protein (147-183), Human HBc147-183

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of a novel antimicrobial peptide from human hepatitis B virus core protein arginine-rich domain (ARD).
Literature.Author: Chen HL, Su PY, Chang YS, Wu SY, Liao YD, Yu HM, Lauderdale TL, Chang K, Shih C

Literature.Title: Improvement of in vivo antimicrobial activity of HBcARD peptides by D-arginine replacement.
Literature.Author: Chen HL, Su PY, Shih C
